nodes.text: Snar was a pilot in the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Fleet who flew against the Galactic Empire at the Battle of Endor and died during the fighting. After the battle was won by the Alliance the pilot was listed as a casualty alongside fellow pilots Gemma, Reet and half of Yellow Squadron.
Snar was first mentioned in the comic book Shattered Empire 1, which was written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
